name: initialLayoutAttributesForAppearingDecorationElement(ofKind:at:)
desc: Returns the starting layout information for a decoration view being added to the collection view.
declaration:
func initialLayoutAttributesForAppearingDecorationElement(ofKind elementKind: NSCollectionView.DecorationElementKind, 
                                                       at decorationIndexPath: IndexPath) -> NSCollectionViewLayoutAttributes?
